reviewText:
How do I start this, well, I don't think it is a bad game... but that is based on playing half of the soties and then game crashed on me.
This game is based on the Mater's Tall Tales, so you know what you are geting into, and every seems to have 4 to 5 minigames that controls nicely.
The driving does feel heavy on the stearing, but you get used to it. Camera should have been higher on the moments when you drive forward in high speed" ( fire figher minigames has 2 of these).
Then the options... whooboy. You are only able to play this game on fullscreen and the highest resolution was 1280 x 960
The audio feels like it likes to jump between low and high on its own. And in audio department

reviewText:
Just your typical Disney game I suppose.

Based off the movie Cars (of course), you create your own car and follow the story of Mater for the whole game.
The animations are kind of crappy but what do you expect for a childrens game.
It's local co-op, so you can play two players (or maybe even four?) on one keyboard, unless you have two seperate keyboards. Seriously, who wants to play sharing the same keyboard!?

The gameplay feels like South Park Rally with a little bit of Superman 64, having to reach checkpoints while driving although not as hard.

Very tedious and not very interesting. It's not a bad game but I would only recommend this to parents who play computer games with their kids.

3/10
